niche: Instagram and social media content creation for Indian D2C brands and small businesses
extra_notes: Focus on: Instagram captions, Reels scripts, carousel post ideas, story engagement prompts, product launch announcements, behind-the-scenes content ideas, customer testimonial templates, hashtag strategy prompts, bio optimization, and content calendar generation. Include GPT instructions for creating a week's worth of content in one go. Make prompts work for fashion, food, beauty, home decor, and wellness brands. Add placeholders like [Brand Name], [Product Category], [Target Audience].
